eventTypes.name: Weddings & Quinceañeras
eventTypes.description: Let's make your event unforgettable by booking your event with DJ Boots Productions. We offer many great set-up options to choose from. The following are some of the packages we offer, all packages can be customized especially for you.
globalFeatures: DJ surprises with 50 pcs Glow sticks and 60 long balloons

eventTypes.name: Corporate
eventTypes.description: DJ Boots Productions brings you the engagement of entertainment. Providing good strategies and up to date ideas to make your event a great experience. Whether it’s a conference, sales meeting, trade show, or a special employee recognition dinner,our experience in the entertainment and corporate fields will bring a unique, memorable vibe to your next event.

eventTypes.name: School Only Packages
eventTypes.description: Specializing in creating great school memories at all school dances such as homecoming, prom, sadie hawkins dance just to name a few. Providing age appropriate music for all tastes. DJ Boots Productions will help create those memories with spectacular set-ups and music.
globalFeatures: DJ surprises with 50 pcs Glow sticks and 60 long balloons
